waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.Layer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LayerConvolution, LayerFlatten, LayerFullyConnected, LayerInput, LayerOutput, LayerPool

    public abstract class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract class that all layer-type-specific classes extend.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private LayerActivation activation
      The activation type that the layer uses.
      private int id
      Each layer has an ID and is it's position in the network.
      private int[] inputSize 
      private java.util.List<Neuron> neurons
      The neurons in this layer.
      private int[] outputSize 
      private LayerType type
      The specific type that the layer is.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Layer(int id, LayerType type, LayerActivation activation)
      This is the only constructor that can be used.

    • Field Detail

      • activation

        private LayerActivation activation
        The activation type that the layer uses. Sometimes null.

      • id

        private int id
        Each layer has an ID and is it's position in the network.

        The neurons in this layer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Layer

        public Layer(int id,
             LayerType type,
             LayerActivation activation)
        This is the only constructor that can be used. Sets the ID, layer type, and activation type of the layer.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID for the layer.
        type - The LayerType that the new layer is.
        activation - The LayerActivation that the layer will use.

    • Method Detail

      • addNeuron

        public void addNeuron(Neuron neuron)
        Adds an instance of Neuron to this layer.
        Parameters:
        neuron - The neuron to add.

      • applyDeltas

        public abstract void applyDeltas()
        Applies the weight deltas to the neurons.

      • calculateDeltas

        public abstract void calculateDeltas(java.util.List<Neuron> lowerNeurons,
                                     java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons)
        Calculates the weight deltas for a given list of neurons.
        Parameters:
        lowerNeurons - The neurons in the layer below.
        upperNeurons - The neurons in the layer above.

      • createNeurons

        public abstract void createNeurons(int number)
        Used to create all of the neurons in the layer. Is abstract so all individual layer types must have their own implementation for this.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of neurons to create.

        public int getId()
        Get the ID of the layer.
        Returns:
        The ID of the layer.

        Returns:
        The neuron.

        Sets the input data for the neurons in a layer.
